With Trump's victory in Iowa, we're inching toward autocracy  —  Iowans voted this week in the Republican primary race, which shouldn't mean very much.  Iowa's population is 3.2 million, about one percent of the total United States.  There are 2,083,000 registered voters there, with 718,000 registered Republican.
